articles.author: Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: CDC cuts recommended isolation period for Americans to 5 days; can India follow suit? - The Indian Express
articles.description: Dr Abhishek Subhash, consultant internal medicine at Bhatia Hospital said that he “wouldn't recommend reducing the quarantine period in India".
articles.content: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has recommended reducing the quarantine period from 10 days to five days for Americans who have tested positive for Covid-19. And similarly, for t… [+4407 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: American Civil War artefacts recovered after 130-year-old time capsule opened up - 9News
articles.description: Conservation experts in Virginia’s capital on Tuesday pulled books, money, ammunition, documents and other artefacts from a time capsule found in the remnants of a pedestal that once held a statue of Confederate Gen. Robert E. Lee
